author: Anya Zoledziowski, Natasha Grzincic
title: First Nations Call For Massive Resource Projects to Be Shut Down During Pandemic
description: The coronavirus "actually reminded me of first contact when we didn't have disease and it was brought to us—like smallpox."
content:
Nestled in the Peace River Valley in northeast British Columbia, almost 900 workers continue construction on BC Hydros Site C megadam project, which will generate enough energy to power about 450,000 houses per year after its scheduled completion in 2025.
